definition-item.definition-title: CYCLE SADDLES OR SEATS; AUXILIARY DEVICES OR ACCESSORIES SPECIALLY ADAPTED TO CYCLES AND NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR, e.g. ARTICLE CARRIERS OR CYCLE PROTECTORS

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Saddles, mudguards, fairings, luggage carriers, petrol tanks and other ancillaries and accessories adapted for use on cycles generally.
In this subclass "cycles" includes single- or plural- wheeled straddle-type vehicles having a handlebar, self-balancing vehicles and kid scooters.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicles, vehicles fittings, or vehicles parts, not otherwise provided for
Kids scooters
Power driven cycles with four or more wheels, e.g. quads
Motorised scooters
Power driven sledges or the like, e.g. snow mobiles or snow bikes

section-body.paragraph-text: Unless otherwise stated, classification should be made in the most appropriate place(s).
Where applicable, additional classification should also be given in the following codes:
B62K2201/00 Springs used in cycle frames or parts thereof
B62K2202/00 Motorized scooters

definition-item.definition-title: Saddles or other seats for cycles; Arrangement thereof; Component parts

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements or adaptations of vehicle seats in general

definition-item.definition-title: Saddles resiliently mounted on the frame; Equipment therefor, e.g. springs

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Saddle resilient suspension arrangements wherein B62J1/04 and B62J1/06 take precedence. Includes flexible cycle frame sections on which the saddle is mounted.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Frame parts for attaching saddle pillars, e.g. adjustable during ride
Springs in general

definition-item.definition-title: Saddles capable of parallel motion up and down

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Mainly telescopic or parallelagram linkage mechanisms combined with a spring of some sort.

definition-item.definition-title: Frames for saddles; Connections between saddle frames and seat pillars; Seat pillars (attaching seat pillars to cycle frames B62K19/36)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:

constructional details of seat posts and seat pillars (not suspension details) and connection arrangements for attaching the saddle to the seat pillar. Seat pillar susupension details are classified in B62J1/02, B62J1/04 and B62J1/06.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Attaching seat pillars to cycle frames

definition-item.definition-title: Box-shaped seats; Bench-type seats, e.g. dual or twin seats

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
motorcycle type seats, these are usually "box" or "bench" shaped and are often provided with a pillion section.

definition-item.definition-title: Covers for saddles or other seats; Paddings

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Specific details of the cover or padding used in or on cycle -type saddles/seats.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Padding in general

section-body.paragraph-text: Cycle refers to any vehicle of a type covered by the definitions in B62K and B62M.

definition-item.definition-title: Acoustic signal devices (arrangements indicating unauthorised use of cycles B62H5/20); Arrangement of such devices on cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements indicating unauthorised use of cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Acoustic signal devices in general
Acoustic signal or alarm devices in general

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of optical signalling or lighting devices on cycles; Mounting or supporting thereof; Circuits therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangement of signalling or lighting devices, the mounting or supporting thereof or circuits therefor, for vehicles in general
Lighting devices also used for indicating unauthorised use of cycles
Optical signalling or lighting devices per se
Non portable lighting devices with built-in power supply
Optical signalling or lighting devices for vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Electric circuits

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements or adaptations of optical signalling or lighting devices
Circuit arrangements for charging batteries from dynamo-electric generators driven at varying speed on vehicle

definition-item.definition-title: Headlights

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Headlights for vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: characterised by vertical adjustment of the light beam direction, e.g. to compensate for heavy loads

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Arrangements to compensate the pitch angle of the light beam, due to e.g. heavy loads.

definition-item.definition-title: Rear lights

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rear lights for vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of lighting dynamos or drives therefor

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Dynamo construction
Arrangements for handling mechanical energy structurally associated with dynamo-electric machines

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of switches

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Handle-bar constructions, or arrangements of controls thereon, specially adapted thereto
Hand controls per se

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of reflectors {, e.g. on the wheel spokes} (pedals incorporating reflectors B62M3/12 ){; Lighting devices mounted on wheel spokes}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pedals incorporating reflectors

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rollers skates; Skate boards with illuminating devices
Self-powered illuminated wheels
For displaying messages, advertising

definition-item.definition-title: Luggage carriers

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Carrying racks or supports for fixing luggage thereon
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Containers specially adapted for cycles, e.g. panniers or saddle bags
Luggage carriers forming part of the frame

definition-item.definition-title: Equipment for securing luggage on carriers

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bungee Hooks

definition-item.definition-title: Supporting arrangements specially adapted for fastening specific devices to cycles, e.g. supports for attaching maps

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Hoods protecting the rider (includes umbrella holders)
Holders for locks
Clamp fasteners using bands
Supports for pipes, cables or protective tubing (cable retainers)

definition-item.definition-title: for pumps

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: The pump being mounted in the saddle-pillar of the bicycle
Pumps for cycles

definition-item.definition-title: for mechanical cables, hoses, pipes or electric wires, e.g. cable guides (mounting or guiding of cables on rear derailleur B62M9/127; mounting or guiding of cables on front derailleur B62M9/137)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Mounting or guiding of cables on rear derailleur
Mounting or guiding of cables on front derailleur

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements of radiators, coolant hoses or pipes on cycles

definition-item.definition-title: specially adapted for helmets (containers under the saddle for helmets B62J9/14)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Containers under the saddle for cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Helmets with anti-theft arrangements

definition-item.definition-title: Guards for chain, chain drive or equivalent drive, e.g. belt drive

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Also sprocket guards.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Chain guards forming part of cycle frames
The chain-stay forming a chain-guard

definition-item.definition-title: Mud-guards for wheels

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Fenders/mud guards specifically adapted for cycles.
Cycle refers to any vehicle of a type covered by the definitions in B62K and B62M. Therefore specific details of mud-guards for tricycles, as classified in B62K, should also be classified here.

definition-item.definition-title: Weather guards for riders; Fairings or stream-lining parts not otherwise provided for

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Engine covers and bodywork generally.

residual-references.section-title: References out of a residual place

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places in relation to which this place is residual:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fairings forming part of cycle frames
Fairings for sidecars
Hoods or fairings for sidecars

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Protective clothing or garments
Crash helmets

definition-item.definition-title: Frame mounted hoods specially adapted for rider propelled cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Frame mounted hoods specially adapted for rider propelled cycles including electric bikes or E-bikes.

definition-item.definition-title: Frame mounted hoods specially adapted for motorcycles or the like

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Frame mounted hoods specially adapted for motorcycles or the like including electrically driven motorcycles.

definition-item.definition-title: Ventilation or air guiding devices forming part of fairings

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Installation specially adapted to cycles for warming riders

definition-item.definition-title: Parking covers for cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Convertible into protective garments for the rider
Convertible into camping articles
For vehicles in general
Packages specially adapted for cycles i.e. covers and crates etc

definition-item.definition-title: Dress protectors, e.g. clips attached to the cycle

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Loose clips for trousers or skirts

definition-item.definition-title: Foot-rests; Knee grips; Passenger hand-grips

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Details of footboards in motorized scooters
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Pedals cranks
Foot-driven levers as pedal cranks which can be immobilised as foot-rests

definition-item.definition-title: Bar-type foot rests

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Bar-type foot rests which also include separate left and right foot rests.

definition-item.definition-title: Safety equipment

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Airbags specially adapted for motorcycles.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Safety belts in general
Vehicle airbags generally

definition-item.definition-title: Crash bars; Crash bungs

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Crash bars or crash bungs and also slide protectors.

definition-item.definition-title: Adaptations or arrangements of mirrors for use on cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: For vehicles in general

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements for warming riders specially adapted for cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Ventilation or air guiding devices in fairings
Heating, cooling, ventilating or other air-treating arrangements for vehicles in general

definition-item.definition-title: Fuel tanks specially adapted for motorcycles or engine-assisted cycles; Arrangements thereof (fuel tanks forming part of cycle frames B62K11/00; tanks in general B60K {; closure caps for fuel tanks B60K15/0406})

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fuel tanks for vehicles
Closure caps for fuel tanks
Fuel tanks forming part of cycle frames

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements of air cleaners specially adapted for cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Combustion-air cleaners
Arranging or mounting on or with respect to engines or vehicle bodies of air cleaners

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements of radiators, coolant hoses or pipes on cycles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements relating to cooling of propulsion units
With liquid cooling

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements of batteries

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Batteries for electrically assisted bicycles

definition-item.definition-title: Electrical equipment arrangements specially adapted for use as accessories on cycles, not otherwise provided for

residual-references.section-title: References out of a residual place

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places in relation to which this place is residual:

table-column.paragraph-text: Arrangements of optical signalling or lighting devices on cycles; Mounting or supporting thereof; Circuits therefor
Electronic display to provide information to the driver
Rider-propelled cycles with auxiliary electric motor

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Electrical actuators for gearing speed-change mechanisms

definition-item.definition-title: Cycle computers as cycle accessories

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Measuring distance traversed on the ground
Registering or indicating the working of vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Sensor arrangements (sensors for control of electrically assisted cycles B62M6/50); Mounting thereof

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Control or actuating devices for rider propelled cycles with auxiliary electric motor characterised by detectors or sensors, or arrangement thereof

section-body.paragraph-text: In B62M6/50 are classified the sensors which are used to control the electric motor of a rider propelled cycle having an auxiliary electric motor.
If the sensor is not used to control the electric motor of a rider propelled cycle having an auxiliary electric motor, then the details of the sensor are classified in B62J45/40 and subgroups.

definition-item.definition-title: electronic, e.g. displays

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Instruments specially adapted for vehicles; Arrangement of instruments in or on vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Number plates

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Registration plates in general

definition-item.definition-title: Means for ventilation within devices provided on the cycle, e.g. ventilation means in a battery container

residual-references.section-title: References out of a residual place

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places in relation to which this place is residual:

table-column.paragraph-text: Ventilation being part of the fairings
Ventilation being part of the air filter
Arrangements relating to cooling of propulsion units

definition-item.definition-title: Ornaments or toys

residual-references.section-title: References out of a residual place

section-body.paragraph-text: Examples of places in relation to which this place is residual:

table-column.paragraph-text: Noise producing devices, e.g. rattles hitting spokes

definition-item.definition-title: Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Tools for bicycles
Instruments specially adapted for vehicles; Arrangement of instruments in or on vehicles
Registration plates
Cyclometers, i.e. wheel revolution counters
Measuring linear or angular speed
